Q_DESC: Take a string s and a dictionary of words dict. Determine if s can be segmented into a space-separated sequence of one or more dictionary words. Print the result as either true or false according to the words choosed. INPUT FORMAT: Get a string s and dictionary of words dict. OUTPUT FORMAT: Print true or false in the manner the words choosed INPUT: sweetbun->sweet bun, bigdata->big data OUTPUT: True because sweetbun, Bigdata can be separated but isolation gives some other meaning so that returns false. Words in Dictonary can be[sweet,us,data,big,whale,bun,let,code,mkce,sea].EXPLANATION: First form the words making a string which is meaningful. Then isolate that selected word into two. The process is that even though the words are isolated it should be same as the meaning of the  word when not isolated. If it done so then the output should be printed as true else false.
